headline: Amazing week we are having – Netflix shares crashing, CNN+ shutting down, Spotify removes Obama podcast, Disney stripped of special governing powers, Masks ruled unlawful on public transportation…
author: IWB
sentences: According to a Friday letter seen by CNBC, House Judiciary Committee Republicans led by ranking member Rep. Jim Jordan (R-OH) have asked Twitter board chairman Bret Taylor to preserve any communications from both official and personal accounts – including those sent using encryption – that have anything to do with Musk’s offer.”

“18 House Republicans have demanded that Twitter’s board preserve all records related to Elon Musk’s buyout offer – suggesting that they will conduct a congressional probe if their party regains control of the chamber this fall.
TWITTER NEEDS TO BE THOROUGLY INVESTIGATED ON SEVERAL FRONTS: House Republicans Demand Twitter Board Preserve All Records Related To Musk Buyout Bid.

pic.twitter.com/Q9GxB01b1Y
— john s. mitchell jr (@johnnythebe) April 22, 2022
The enemy is in free fall, keep up the pressure!
